name: Pentaclaus: Happy Christmas!!
description:
My first game, help pentaclaus to escape.

Launch it, and complete the level in as few jumps as you can and unlock new characters.

HOW TO PLAY:

Press left click in your character, move the mouse, and release the click, your character will be thrown in the opposite direction.

You should caculate the launch force to catch all the gifts in the least number of thrown.

TIPS

-You can do, double, triple or whatever you want, jumps, but it count for you final score.

-You can press you character in the air to try stop it and no fall so much.

Send me photos of your best records, and its possible that i did a litle gift in next projects.

Good luck ,enjoy the game and HAPPY CHRISTMAS!! :)
